name: Velocidevorium
description:
Are you hungry? It's time to eat or die trying.Welcome to the first, best, and only casual 3D claymation snakelike. Take control of a fast-growing serpent and feast on everything in sight (except things that explode of course). And don't run into your own wriggling tail. This is a game about eating from the maker of Retrobooster. Some game modes are about fast eating, while others are about strategic eating. In fact, Velocidevorium is pseudo-Latin for "a place of swift devouring."Features
  • Eating
  • Vomiting
  • Game controller support
  • Multiple mini-games
  • Split-screen combat modes
  • A multitude of unlockable levels
  • More eating
  • Extremely procedural levels (they morph continuously)
  • Ice cream!
Procedural blah blah blahYou have heard all the usual chatter about procedural levels, but this game is different. Instead of generating a level and then tossing you into it, Velocidevorium's levels change every frame. The surface you are playing on constantly transforms. Watch the trailer closely and you'll get the idea.Art styleStop-frame animation all the way! This world is made mostly out of clay, but you'll find other knick-knacks here too. Maybe the game should just be called Clay Simulator 2020.
